alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 8:35AM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds could gust as high as 55 MPH. Visibility could be reduced to as low as one-half mile at times in falling and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
